name: Logitech Brio 4K Webcam
image_prompt: Logitech Brio 4K webcam, black cylindrical design, glass lens, clip mount for monitor, premium build
description: Professional 4K Ultra HD webcam with HDR and Windows Hello support. Features 5x digital zoom, auto light correction, and dual omnidirectional mics for crystal-clear video calls.

reviews.review_text: Finally look professional on Zoom calls. 4K is overkill but downscales beautifully.
Windows Hello login is super convenient.
Great camera but needs good lighting to shine.
